name: Trapped in time (GhoTS)
description:
Trapped in time

You were trapped in time loop, manipulate timeline to escaped.

This is my entry for Brackeys Jam 2020.2, also my first game jam :)

Hi, unfortunately I didn't manage to finish the game on time, at least the main level of the game, but I finished the tutorial level of the game, and you can play, there isn't much of the content, but it explaine the main mechanices of the game. So if u decide to download my game and play it, let me know what you think, and I in return play your game and leave the command.

About game:
My game is a platformer in which you goal is to escape from the castle, but you are limited by time, whenever you run out of the time or you character dies, you travels back in time to the starting point. You progress in game by locking object in time and collecting items which grants you special ability to get in diffrent places(like in metroidvania typo of a game).

What in game:
- Character control (moving, jumping, attacking)
- Inventory and Collecting items
- Locking object in time
- Tutorial level
- Destructible object

What missing :
- Enemies
- Bosses
- Main level
- Music
- No in-game menu

you can check the source code there -> https://github.com/GhooTS/Game-Jam-2020.2
